CaseShare.name: CaseShare
CaseShare.description: Represents a sharing entry on a Case.

CaseAccessLevel.description: Level of access that the User or Group has to the Case. The possible values are: Read Edit All This value isn’t valid for creating or deleting records. This field must be set to an access level that is higher than the organization’s default access level for cases.

CaseId.description: ID of the Case associated with this sharing entry. This field can't be updated.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

RowCause.description: Reason that this sharing entry exists. If you’re creating a sharing entry, the only permitted value is Manual. If no value is specified, the field defaults to Manual. All other RowCause values are read-only. After the sharing entry is created, this field can’t be edited.

UserOrGroupId.description: ID of the User or Group that has been given access to the Case. This field can't be updated.
